attributes.action: provide more resources to the police deal with bad driving on the mnotorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My friends and I who spend a lot of time on the road and are sick of seeing the highway code flouted wherever we go.  A few more unmarked police cars tasked with craking down specifiacally on these people and civing them a caution, and some publicity, would make roads a lot safer places to be for very little investment.
